dashboard.submitQueryToBegin: Submit a query in the Cognitive Command console to begin a dialogue.

commandCenter.queryPlaceholder: Enter a query or send a follow-up...
commandCenter.manualControlsDisabled: Manual controls are disabled during cognitive processing.

cognitiveProcess.nexusIsPlanning: NexusAI is formulating a cognitive plan...
cognitiveProcess.influencedByAffectiveStateAtTime: Influenced by Affective State at time of synthesis.

replicas.pruneConfirmation: Are you sure you want to prune this replica and all its children? This action is permanent.
replicas.noSubReplicas: No sub-cognition replicas are currently active.
replicas.spawnChildHint: Use the "Spawn Child" control on the Core Unit to create one.
replicas.broadcastProblem: Broadcast a Problem to the Network
replicas.broadcastProblemPlaceholder: e.g., 'Find the most efficient route for a fleet of 10 drones...'

tools.decommissionConfirm: Are you sure you want to permanently decommission the tool "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
tools.name: Name
tools.noToolsMatchHint: Try adjusting filters or forging a new tool.

toolchains.promptName: Enter a name for the new toolchain:
toolchains.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the toolchain "{{name}}"?
toolchains.workflowsDesc: Create, modify, and deploy sequences of mental tools for complex, automated tasks.
toolchains.noToolchainsHint: Click "Create New Toolchain" to build your first cognitive workflow.
toolchains.descPlaceholder: A short description of the workflow's purpose.
toolchains.addToolsHint: Add tools from the left panel to build your chain.

behaviors.strategiesDesc: A library of reusable problem-solving strategies extracted by the AI from its own successful operations.
behaviors.emptyHandbookHint: Complete a cognitive task and use the "Extract Behavior" action to start building this library.
behaviors.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the behavior "{{name}}"?

analysis.title: Analysis Lab
analysis.disabledWhileThinking: Analysis is disabled while the AI is thinking.
analysis.loadingMessageDesc: Please wait while the AI examines the system...
analysis.readyMessageDesc: Configure your analysis options and click "Run Analysis" to generate insights.
analysis.noSuggestions: Analysis complete. No specific suggestions at this time.

settings.agentPersonalityDesc: Defines the AI's core cognitive style based on 4 axes. This influences planning, decision-making, and interaction.
settings.cognitiveProfileDesc: Select the AI's performance and response style. 'Pro' provides deeper analysis, while 'Lite' is faster and more concise.
settings.cognitiveStepDelayDesc: Adds a delay between each step of the AI's execution plan. Higher values prevent API rate-limiting errors.
settings.animationLevelDesc: Adjust the level of UI animations. 'None' may improve performance on some systems.
settings.logVerbosityDesc: 'Verbose' includes additional informational logs. 'Standard' shows important system events.
settings.responseLanguageDesc: Sets the language for AI responses and thinking processes. Changing this will start a new chat session.
settings.factoryResetDesc: Clear all stored settings and cache data, resetting the app to its default state.
settings.factoryResetConfirm: Are you sure you want to perform a factory reset? This will clear ALL local data, including settings, and reload the application.

energyFocus.label: Energy Focus
energyFocus.desc: How the agent directs and receives its cognitive energy.

informationProcessing.label: Information Processing
informationProcessing.desc: How the agent perceives and interprets information.

decisionMaking.label: Decision Making
decisionMaking.desc: How the agent makes decisions and comes to conclusions.

worldApproach.label: World Approach
worldApproach.desc: The agent's preferred approach to the outer world and tasks.

evolution.problemPlaceholder: Enter a complex problem for the AI to solve through evolution...
evolution.initializeHint: Define a problem and initialize a population to begin.
evolution.ensembleReady: Evolution complete. The fittest individuals are ready for synthesis.
evolution.ensembleHint: Run evolution to generate candidate solutions.
evolution.problemRequired: A problem statement is required to initialize the population.

memory.title: Memory Explorer
memory.noMemoriesHint: Try adjusting your filters or archiving new cognitive traces.
memory.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this memory?
memory.semanticSearchActive: Semantic search is active. Other filters are temporarily disabled.

traceInspector.title: Cognitive Trace Inspector
traceInspector.reflecting: AI is reflecting on its performance...
traceInspector.discussionHubDesc: Ask questions about the AI's plan, reasoning, or final answer.

errorBoundary.title: Interface Anomaly
errorBoundary.heading: An unexpected error occurred.
errorBoundary.message: This interface module has encountered a problem. Reloading the application or navigating to another view usually resolves this. The event has been logged for review.

dreaming.title: Cognitive Dreaming Chamber
dreaming.description: In this state, the AI will introspect on its collective memory—analyzing past successes, failures, and strategies. It will synthesize these experiences into new, high-level directives to improve its future performance.
dreaming.newDirectives: The following new directives have been integrated into the cognitive core:
dreaming.idleMessage: Dream cycle has not been initiated.

toolForge.title: Forge a New Mental Tool
toolForge.inProgressDesc: Synthesizing a new cognitive instrument based on your design...
toolForge.unknownError: An unknown error occurred during forging.
toolForge.purposePlaceholder: e.g., 'Analyze market sentiment from real-time news feeds.'

constitutionManager.title: Active Cognitive Constitution
constitutionManager.noRules: No special rules. Operating under default parameters.
constitutionManager.selectHint: Select a constitution to view its rules.

memorySelector.title: Load Problem from Memory
memorySelector.description: Select a past experience to use as a foundation for evolution.
